TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrintQueueException extends System.Printing.PrintSystemException

summary.span: The exception that is thrown when an error condition prevents the accessing or creation of a .

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error condition prevents the accessing or creation of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.
